name: consulta_simples_nacional
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Queries the Simples Nacional system for information related to a given tax ID.

taxid.description: The tax ID (CNPJ) to be queried.

maxage.description: The maximum age of the data (in days) to be retrieved. Defaults to 30.

history.description: Whether to include historical data in the query. Defaults to None.
